ComicInfo.Summary: Ghostly mobsters, including Al Capone, strike a deal in Purgatory, trading innocent souls for an escape route. Meanwhile, Venkman reunites with his team and introduces spirits of famed law enforcers as allies. Together, they plan to interrupt the mobsters' operations. In the real world, Fred, using Venkman's body, gets entangled in the ghostly mob's plot. As tensions rise in Purgatory, the Ghostbusters, alongside their newfound allies, brace for a confrontation with the mobsters and their spectral army.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:04:18. [CVDB146908] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 09:46:47. [Issue ID 562562]
ComicInfo.Characters: Lucky Luciano,Bugsy Siegel,Jelly Bryce,Ray Stantz,Eliot Ness,Winston Zeddemore,Meyer Lansky,Al Capone,Egon Spengler,Janine Melnitz,Peter Venkman,J. Edgar Hoover
